itunes:title: #2: Why You Can't Control Them...
title: #2: Why You Can't Control Them...
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: Often times, we're stuck in unhealthy relationship cycles because we think we can control others. This episode, we'll talk about why this may happen and some examples that commonly occur.    Have a question for the podcast? Ask it...
itunes:summary:
Often times, we're stuck in unhealthy relationship cycles because we think we can control others. This episode, we'll talk about why this may happen and some examples that commonly occur. 

 

Have a question for the podcast? Ask it here: 
http://www.blackgirlsheal.org/questions
